'''''Icy Harvest''''' is a [[Crimson Wish]] World Quest in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description| [[Crimson Agate]]s seem to contain a bizarre power that does not belong to this land, and it is coveted by monsters and evildoers alike. Defeat them, and these crystals may yet be yours.}}
;Version 1
#Defeat all opponents (0/X)

;Version 2
#Melt the snow
#Defeat all opponents (0/2)
